column1: Funeral services will be held Monday June 15
column2: 2015 at 1:00 P.M. at Antioch Baptist Church with services conducted by Rev. Hoyle Harrison with burial to follow in the Church Cemetery. The family will receive friends from 12 Noon until time for the service at Antioch Baptist Church. Moody Funeral Home in Mt. Airy will be assisting the Butcher Family.
